data.DescriptionHtml:
By casting this spell, you project a bolt of energy from the Positive Energy Plane against one creature.
You must make a successful ranged touch attack to strike your target.
A creature struck suffers varying damage, depending on its nature or its home plane of existence and your level:
data.Name: Bolt of Glory
data.Rulebook: Defenders of the Faith: A Guidebook to Clerics and Paladins
